sys_script_include.name: FHCheckRecordCount

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ea460ac8831a321083e1b4a6feaad3d9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1310794_founda_0.FHCheckRecordCount</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>FHCheckRecordCount</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var FHCheckRecordCount = Class.create();
FHCheckRecordCount.prototype = {
    execute: function(ctx) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(ctx.config.table_name);
        var count = gr.getRowCount();
        ctx.metrics.record_count = count;

        if (count === 0) {
            ctx.addIssue('EMPTY_TABLE', 'Table contains no records', 'medium');
        }
    },
    type: 'FHCheckRecordCount'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-02 23:09:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>ea460ac8831a321083e1b4a6feaad3d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FHCheckRecordCount</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer" source="x_1310794_founda_0">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ea460ac8831a321083e1b4a6feaad3d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-02 23:09:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
